steps.title: Navigate to the official ElvUI downloads page at https://www.tukui.org/download.php?ui=elvui.
steps.content: Navigate to the official ElvUI downloads page at https://www.tukui.org/download.php?ui=elvui . [1] X Research source ElvUI is available for all WoW players from members of the Tukui WoW gaming community.

steps.title: Click on “Download” below ElvUI, then select the option to save the .zip file to your desktop.
steps.content: Click on “Download” below ElvUI, then select the option to save the .zip file to your desktop.

steps.title: Navigate to your desktop and double-click on the ElvUI .zip file to extract its contents.
steps.content: Navigate to your desktop and double-click on the ElvUI .zip file to extract its contents.

steps.title: Open the “World of Warcraft” folder on your computer using File Explorer in Windows or Finder on Mac OS X.
steps.content: Open the “World of Warcraft” folder on your computer using File Explorer in Windows or Finder on Mac OS X.

steps.title: Open the “Interface” folder, then open the “Add-ons” folder.
steps.content: Open the “Interface” folder, then open the “Add-ons” folder.

steps.title: Click back over to your desktop and copy the files named “ElvUI” and “ElvUI_Config” that were extracted earlier from the .zip file.
steps.content: Click back over to your desktop and copy the files named “ElvUI” and “ElvUI_Config” that were extracted earlier from the .zip file.

steps.title: Paste these files into the “Add-ons” folder in your WoW folder.
steps.content: Paste these files into the “Add-ons” folder in your WoW folder. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Launch your WoW game, then navigate to the character selection screen.
steps.content: Launch your WoW game, then navigate to the character selection screen.

steps.title: Select the option to start your game.
steps.content: Select the option to start your game. You can now follow the in-game instructions from ElvUI during gameplay to enhance your WoW gaming experience. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Try using the Tukui Windows Client instead of Curse Client if using the program to add ElvUI to WoW.
steps.content: Try using the Tukui Windows Client instead of Curse Client if using the program to add ElvUI to WoW. The Tukui Windows Client is designed to help you manage any add-ons downloaded from the Tukui website, whereas Curse Client no longer fully supports add-ons from Tukui. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Return to the ElvUI downloads page at https://www.tukui.org/download.php?ui=elvui and download the latest version of ElvUI if the interface stops working properly.
steps.content: Return to the ElvUI downloads page at https://www.tukui.org/download.php?ui=elvui and download the latest version of ElvUI if the interface stops working properly. In some cases, ElvUI may malfunction if newer versions of the software exist.

steps.title: Verify your ElvUI files don’t reside in any extra folder layers in your WoW “Add-ons” folder.
steps.content: Verify your ElvUI files don’t reside in any extra folder layers in your WoW “Add-ons” folder. Placing the ElvUI files in extra folder layers can prevent ElvUI from loading properly during WoW gameplay.

steps.title: Make sure you unzip the ElvUI files before attempting to move them over to the WoW folder on your computer.
steps.content: Make sure you unzip the ElvUI files before attempting to move them over to the WoW folder on your computer. If your computer lacks a default unzip program, consider downloading WinZip, WinRar, or 7zip for your Windows computer, or The Unarchiver or StuffIt if using Mac OS X.

steps.title: Exit and relaunch WoW if the ElvUI add-on fails to display in the “Add-ons” menu.
steps.content: Exit and relaunch WoW if the ElvUI add-on fails to display in the “Add-ons” menu. In most cases, WoW will fail to register add-on changes until you exit and restart the game.
